title: Poster, "Niebelungen", 1924–27
medium: Lithograph on thin dark cream newsprint laid down on linen-lined paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Lucy Work Hewitt
description:
The text of poster announcing the movie "Niebelungen", where and when it will be shown, is symmetrically printed on red and black color-blocks, horizontally arranged on white ground.
Imprinted accross top edge of the poster: "COLISEUM" ("KOLIZEY"); on either side: "Beginning November 17th"; below in the center: "Chistye Prudy, tel. 5-40-30"; accross middle in large red and white letters on black color-block: "NIEBELUNGEN" ("NIBELUNGI").
Imprinted below movie title in black on red color-band: "1st part "Siegfried/The film will be accompanied by the orchestra under dir(ection) of S. Plotnikov/Show times: weekdays 8 and 10:15, holidays 6 o'clock/Any passes are not valid."
Imprinted accross bottom edge of poster: "Tip. "New Village" Moscow, 2nd Rybinskaya, #3. Edition of 1500. Mosc. Gublit No 1453."

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Niebelungen", 1924–27.Lithograph on thin dark cream newsprint laid down on linen-lined paper. Museum purchase through gift of Lucy Work Hewitt. 1992-167-2.
